description: Engineered and optimized large-scale ML workflows using PySpark on Databricks, reducing data preprocessing time by 5% through analytical problem-solving and efficient distributed computing architecture.

Architected a production-ready RAG-based Chatbot leveraging LangChain and LangGraph, enhancing the accuracy of client information retrieval by 15% and demonstrating innovative creativity in applying Generative AI to real-world business automation.

Automated the extraction and transformation of 10,000+ unstructured emails into structured data using Python and Pandas, demonstrating meticulous attention to detail and creating a clean dataset for analysis.

Executed the full machine learning lifecycle, performing in-depth EDA, data cleaning, and feature engineering to build a highly accurate supervised classification model for automated email categorization.

Developed and deployed a scalable REST API to serve the ML model, enabling real-time predictions and reducing manual processing effort by 20+ hours per week, highlighting strong initiative and end-to-end project ownership.

Authored comprehensive documentation and held knowledge-transfer sessions for the help-desk team, ensuring smooth adoption of the new automated system and showcasing effective knowledge sharing and communication.

Designed, developed, and documented 15+ secure RESTful APIs in PHP for a hotel management platform, ensuring 100% reliability through rigorous testing with Postman and exemplifying strong time management and backend expertise.

Built a predictive analytics model using supervised ML techniques and Scikit-learn, which improved hotel occupancy rate forecasting accuracy by 15% and provided data-driven insights for strategic planning.

Translated complex model outputs into clear, actionable business intelligence reports for management, effectively bridging the gap between technical data and operational strategy through sharp analytical reasoning.

Collaborated with a small development team in an Agile setup, participating in daily scrums and code reviews, which enhanced the team's output and reinforced adaptable and collaborative work practices.

Developed 10+ dynamic, responsive, and interactive web pages using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and PHP, contributing to a measured 15% increase in user engagement through creative and user-centric front-end design.

Significantly enhanced application security by implementing a robust JWT-based authentication system from scratch, demonstrating reliable technical judgment and a deep understanding of web security principles.
Built an automated data scraping pipeline using Selenium to collect and aggregate information from 50+ different sources, improving data timeliness by 90% and saving 5+ hours of manual work weekly.

Proactively identified performance bottlenecks in existing web pages and optimized them, resulting in faster load times and an improved user experience, showcasing self-motivation and a commitment to quality.
